text:
Gazing at Freedom

<setup: Raskolnikov on riverbank, lost in thought>
<speaker>: I see freedom across the river...

<speaker>: Nomads live there, unlike us. 

<speaker>: Time stands still for them.

---

<setup: Sonia approaches, timid yet hopeful>
<speaker>: I’m here, Raskolnikov.

<speaker>: Please take my hand...

<speaker>: I won’t let go this time.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov reflects on freedom and his troubled thoughts while sitting by the river, and is joined by Sonia, whose presence brings a mix of joy and tension.
